Author: speedayyyy
Text: I’m about my LW rn, but it’s still a BMI of 21 so it’s not like I’m tiny or anything. I haven’t been this weight in over 5 years so I was in high school back then. I’ve also been through a pregnancy, so my hips are wider and I have fat in places I didn’t before. My body just doesn’t look the same as it did when I was 15 which I know isn’t something that is even possible since I’m almost 23 lol. I felt like this was a good weight for me back then, I looked awesome!! Now it’s like I don’t even recognize my body in the mirror :( doesn’t help that I’ve lost 78 pounds so I’ve got cellulite/stretch marks and my girls are saggy. It just sucks.

Author: paperklipp
Text: I’m a couple pounds heavier than my LW but my body fat percentage has gone way down since then and my muscle percentage has gone way up, so I know I’m technically smaller now than I was then, but I’m so hung up on the number I can’t stop seeing myself as a tiny-headed twenty-something female with the body of a professional male rugby player.
